text: The 2019 Belgian Road Cycling Cup (known as the Bingoal Cycling Cup for sponsorship reasons) is the fourth edition of the Belgian Road Cycling Cup. Timothy Dupont is the defending champion. ==Events== Several changes were made to the calendar compared to the previous season: Le Samyn, Dwars door West–Vlaanderen, the Heistse Pijl, the Grote Prijs Jef Scherens, the Eurométropole and Binche–Chimay–Binche no longer took part and were replaced by the Grote Prijs Jean-Pierre Monseré, the Circuit de Wallonie, the Schaal Sels and the Memorial Rik Van Steenbergen. As a result, the total number of races dropped from ten to eight. {| class="wikitable sortable" !Date !! Event !! Winner !!
